files.name: Connector.rsd
files.contents:
<api:script xmlns:api="http://apiscript.com/ns?v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">

  <api:info title="chargepoints" desc="Generated schema file." xmlns:other="http://apiscript.com/ns?v1">
    <attr name="ChargeDeviceId"      xs:type="string"   readonly="false" other:xPath="ChargeDeviceId" />
    <attr name="ChargeDeviceRef"     xs:type="string"   readonly="false" other:xPath="ChargeDeviceRef" />
    <attr name="DeviceNetworks"      xs:type="string"   readonly="false" other:xPath="DeviceNetworks" />
    <attr name="ChargeDeviceStatus"  xs:type="string"   readonly="false" other:xPath="ChargeDeviceStatus" />
    <attr name="Latitude"            xs:type="string"   readonly="false" other:xPath="ChargeDeviceLocation/Latitude" />
    <attr name="Longitude"           xs:type="string"   readonly="false" other:xPath="ChargeDeviceLocation/Longitude" />
    <attr name="DateCreated"         xs:type="string" readonly="false" other:xPath="DateCreated" />

    <attr name="ConnectorId"         xs:type="string"   readonly="false" other:xPath="Connector/ConnectorId" />
    <attr name="ConnectorType"       xs:type="string"   readonly="false" other:xPath="Connector/ConnectorType" />
    <attr name="RatedOutputkW"       xs:type="string"   readonly="false" other:xPath="Connector/RatedOutputkW" />
    <attr name="ChargeMethod"        xs:type="string"   readonly="false" other:xPath="Connector/ChargeMethod" />
    <attr name="ChargePointStatus"   xs:type="string"   readonly="false" other:xPath="Connector/ChargePointStatus" />
  </api:info>

  <api:set attr="uri" value="https://chargepoints.dft.gov.uk/api/retrieve/registry/format/json" />

  <api:set attr="DataModel" value="FlattenedDocuments" />
  <api:set attr="JSONPath" value="$.ChargeDevice;$.ChargeDevice.Connector;" />

  <api:script method="GET">
    <api:set attr="method" value="GET"/>
    <api:call op="jsonproviderGet">
      <api:push/>
    </api:call>
  </api:script>

</api:script>
